Articles.Content: Hey everyone, I'm new to the forums! I've been playing KSP for a few days now and recently stumbled across the forums. Lots of great stuff on here. I can only hope I will be able to contribute something valuable!
Welcome! What have you accomplished so far?

I've accomplished putting a basic space station into low orbit around Kerbin. I've also had many manned missions to the Mun and returned safely to Kerbin! I've landed a few rovers on the surface of the Mun as well, but I've found that rover construction is one of the more difficult parts of the game so far!
